verbs.description: Gina Haspel , President Donald Trump 's pick to [V: be] [ARG2: the next CIA director] , says in a new letter that the CIA should not have conducted then - President George W. Bush 's interrogation and detention program where waterboarding and other brutal interrogation tactics were used on detainees .
